mapper.insert: insert into systemmsgrecord (userId, msgContent, msgType,fromId) values (#{userId},#{msgContent},#{msgType},#{fromId});
mapper.update: update systemmsgrecord set msgStatus=1 where userId=#{userId} and msgType="newFriend"
mapper.select: select * from systemmsgrecord where userId=#{userId} and msgStatus=#{msgStatus}
